about_the_game:
Welcome to Colorless, a unique puzzle platformer where you control perspective to overcome challenging obstacles and discover hidden paths. Immerse yourself in a captivating world where shifting your point of view is the key to success.

Do you Remember ?





After a head injury, you find yourself in a mysterious and surreal world, devoid of color and memories. As you awaken in this enigmatic place, a sense of curiosity and urgency grips you. Who are you? Why are you here? These questions echo through the void of your forgotten past, propelling you on a quest to uncover the truth behind your existence.

Engage with the world you see





In Colorless, you possess the unique power to manipulate perspective, shifting your point of view to reveal hidden pathways and objects. As you traverse the beautifully haunting landscapes, the world around you changes color, exposing new opportunities to interact or use objects as platforms.

What happened here ?





Reveal the secrets of what happened in this enigmatic realm as you piece together the fragments of history. Every step takes you closer to unlocking the truth that lies within this mesmerizing journey of self-discovery. Get ready to immerse yourself in a captivating adventure where exploration is the key to unraveling the mysteries of the forgotten world.

content_descriptors.notes: As you progress through the game, you may find faceless dead people stabbed with a knife or other objects.
